title: Bus firm looking for new drivers
text:
Bluestar looking for new bus drivers Bus firm looking for new drivers 4 comments 
A HAMPSHIRE bus company is on the lookout for new drivers after investing in its services. 
Bluestar is holding a recruitment day in an effort to find drivers to join its team and anyone who is interested will have a chance to talk to Bluestar representatives at the event. 
Successful applicants will receive full training, uniform and free travel for themselves and a nominee. 
Bluestar operations manager Paul Coyne said: "We are always on the lookout for anyone with excellent customer service skills to come and join us - and I have no doubt there are plenty of candidates who fit the bill here in Southampton . Share article 
"This is a fantastic opportunity for anyone looking to try something new and it's a great time to join Bluestar." 
The event is at the WestQuay centre between 9am and 4pm on Friday. Promoted Stories Bluestar looking for new bus drivers   Juanhater 11:25am Thu 17 Sep 15
